body: This trade route carries exotic goods such as art, musical instruments, books, spices, dyes, and magic items. Count all Alchemists, Caster's Towers, Exotic Artisans, Herbalists, Luxury Stores, and Magic Shops in the starting settlement and divide by 10; a successful luxuries trade route increases Economy by that amount. You must have at least 1 Luxury Store in your settlement.
name: Luxuries
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Kingdoms And War/Optional Kingdom Rules/Trade Edicts/Luxuries
